legal.privacy.title: Privacy Policy
legal.privacy.intro: Swap ("we," "our," or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our mobile application and services.
legal.privacy.section1.title: Information We Collect
legal.privacy.section1.intro: We collect information that you provide directly to us, including:
legal.privacy.section1.item1: Personal information (name, email address, phone number)
legal.privacy.section1.item2: Identity verification documents (government-issued ID, proof of address)
legal.privacy.section1.item3: Financial information (bank account details, transaction history)
legal.privacy.section1.item4: Device information (device type, operating system, unique identifiers)
legal.privacy.section1.item5: Usage data (how you interact with our services)
legal.privacy.section2.title: How We Use Your Information
legal.privacy.section2.intro: We use the information we collect to:
legal.privacy.section2.item1: Provide, maintain, and improve our services
legal.privacy.section2.item2: Process transactions and send related information
legal.privacy.section2.item3: Verify your identity and prevent fraud
legal.privacy.section2.item4: Comply with legal and regulatory requirements
legal.privacy.section2.item5: Send you technical notices and support messages
legal.privacy.section2.item6: Respond to your comments and questions
legal.privacy.section3.title: Information Sharing
legal.privacy.section3.intro: We may share your information with:
legal.privacy.section3.item1: Service providers who assist in our operations
legal.privacy.section3.item3: Law enforcement when required by law
legal.privacy.section4.title: Data Security
legal.privacy.section4.text: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. This includes encryption, secure servers, and regular security assessments.
legal.privacy.section5.title: Your Rights
legal.privacy.section5.item3: Request deletion of your data (subject to legal requirements)
legal.privacy.section6.title: Contact Us
legal.privacy.section6.text: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or our privacy practices, please contact us at contact@swap.ht
legal.terms.title: Terms and Conditions
legal.terms.intro: Welcome to Swap. These Terms and Conditions ("Terms") govern your use of the Swap mobile application and services. By using our services, you agree to be bound by these Terms.
legal.terms.section1.title: 1. Agreement to Terms
legal.terms.section1.text: By accessing or using Swap, you confirm that you are at least 18 years old and have the legal capacity to enter into these Terms. If you do not agree with any part of these Terms, you may not use our services.
legal.terms.section2.title: 2. Services Description
legal.terms.section2.intro: Swap provides digital financial services including:
legal.terms.section3.title: 3. Account Requirements
legal.terms.section3.intro: To use our services, you must:
legal.terms.section3.item1: Provide accurate and complete registration information
legal.terms.section3.item3: Maintain the security of your account credentials
legal.terms.section3.item4: Notify us immediately of any unauthorized access
legal.terms.section4.title: 4. Prohibited Activities
legal.terms.section4.intro: You agree not to use our services for:
legal.terms.section4.item3: Violation of any applicable laws or regulations
legal.terms.section4.item5: Any activity that could harm Swap or its users
legal.terms.section5.title: 5. Fees and Charges
legal.terms.section5.text: Certain services may be subject to fees as disclosed in our fee schedule. We reserve the right to modify fees with prior notice to users.
legal.terms.section6.title: 6. Intellectual Property
legal.terms.section6.text: All content, trademarks, and intellectual property in the Swap application are owned by us or our licensors. You may not copy, modify, or distribute our content without permission.
legal.terms.section7.title: 7. Limitation of Liability
legal.terms.section7.text: To the maximum extent permitted by law, Swap shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising from your use of our services.
legal.terms.section8.title: 8. Governing Law
legal.terms.section8.text: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the jurisdiction in which Swap operates, without regard to conflict of law principles.
legal.terms.section9.title: 9. Changes to Terms
legal.terms.section9.text: We may update these Terms from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the new Terms in the app. Your continued use of our services after such changes constitutes acceptance of the updated Terms.
legal.terms.section10.title: 10. Contact
legal.terms.section10.text: For questions about these Terms, please contact us at contact@swap.ht
hero.subtitle: We're your partner for growth in Haiti. Swap gives your business a digital home and a unique address, connects you with a community of new customers, and actively markets your products. We succeed when you do.
pain.title: Two Methods. One Clear Choice.
pain.old_way.title: The Old Way
pain.old_way.line1: Waste hours in long bank lines
pain.old_way.line2: Risk carrying large amounts of cash
pain.swap_way.title: The Swap Way
pain.swap_way.line4: Real cashback on your local spending
for_you.title: Finance that works for you, not against you.
for_you.feature1.title: Your Bank, Always Open:
for_you.feature1.text: No more wasted time. Your bank is available 24/7, right on your phone. No more lines, no more closed doors.
for_you.feature2.title: Get Paid Instantly:
for_you.feature2.text: Whether it's your salary, a client payment, or money from the diaspora, receive it instantly. We value your hustle—your money should be there when you earn it.
for_you.feature3.title: Build Your Financial Future:
for_you.feature3.text: Every transaction builds your financial history. Swap helps you create a formal economic identity, unlocking access to credit and new opportunities tomorrow.
for_business.title: Swap into formality and get access to a bigger market.
for_business.subtitle: Swap gives every Haitian business, big or small, the tools to get seen, get paid, and grow.
for_business.feature1.title: Unique Verified Address:
for_business.feature1.text: Get a unique, verified address to formalize your business and build trust with customers.
for_business.feature2.title: Effortless Payroll:
for_business.feature2.text: Pay your employees instantly through Swap, fueling the digital ecosystem and making payday simple.
for_business.feature3.title: Business Management Tools:
for_business.feature3.text: Access simple tools to manage your operations, track sales, and understand your business performance.
our_vision.title: Building Haiti's New Economy. Together.
our_vision.subtitle: We're creating a self-sustaining financial loop. Where money stays in the community, empowering the people who earn it. Here's how:
our_vision.step1.title: The Community is the Bank
our_vision.step1.text: Our network of "Swappers"—trusted local Swap agents and members—allows you to deposit or withdraw cash when you need it. The bank is now on every corner.
our_vision.step2.title: Unlock Your Potential with Fair Credit
our_vision.step2.text: Every transaction on Swap helps build your unique credit score. This is your key to unlocking fair, transparent loans to grow your business or achieve your dreams.
our_vision.step3.title: Your Passport to the Global Economy
our_vision.step3.text: With the upcoming Swap Card, you can spend your money online or abroad, connecting you and your business to the world.
trust.title: Simple & Honest.
trust.feature1.title: Free P2P Transfers
trust.feature1.text: Send money to any Swap user for free. No limits, no exceptions.
trust.feature2.title: No Hidden Fees
trust.feature2.text: We believe in radical transparency. The only fee you'll see is a small, clear percentage for cash withdrawals.
trust.feature3.title: Real Cashback
trust.feature3.text: Earn money back on purchases at your favorite local businesses. The more you use Swap, the more you earn.
final_cta.title: What are you waiting for to Swap? Join the movement.
final_cta.subtitle: Have a question? Contact our team. We're here to help.
footer.slogan: I Swap, You Swap, We Swap.
footer.about: Swap is a financial technology company, dedicated to environmental protection and community development in Haiti.
